title: Segmentation fault in rustc

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code I haven't managed to trace it to anything. ### Meta The bug does not exist in the nightly compiler: `rustc +nightly --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.46.0-nightly (346aec9b0 2020-07-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: 346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49 commit-date: 2020-07-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.46.0-nightly LLVM version: 10.0 ``` But was found using this compiler: `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.44.1 (c7087fe00 2020-06-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: c7087fe00d2ba919df1d813c040a5d47e43b0fe7 commit-date: 2020-06-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.44.1 LLVM version: 9.0 ``` ### Error output Backtrace retrieved with `gdb -p (pidof rustc)`, as `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` doesn't print anything.
Backtrace

``` #0 0x00007fa0ec81c068 in llvm::ModuleSummaryIndex::getOrInsertValueInfo(llvm::GlobalValue const*) () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-9-rust-1.44.1-stable.so #1 0x00007fa0ec8151b7 in llvm::buildModuleSummaryIndex(llvm::Module const&, std::function, llvm::ProfileSummaryInfo*) () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-9-rust-1.44.1-stable.so #2 0x00007fa0ec81b28b in llvm::ModuleSummaryIndexWrapperPass::runOnModule(llvm::Module&) () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-9-rust-1.44.1-stable.so #3 0x00007fa0eb738030 in llvm::legacy::PassManagerImpl::run(llvm::Module&) () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-9-rust-1.44.1-stable.so #4 0x00007fa0eedcaf55 in LLVMRustThinLTOBufferCreate () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-32779e2abdce211d.so #5 0x00007fa0eed1ad66 in rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::codegen () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-32779e2abdce211d.so #6 0x00007fa0eecc6a43 in rustc_codegen_ssa::back::write::execute_work_item () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-32779e2abdce211d.so #7 0x00007fa0eed87ade in std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-32779e2abdce211d.so #8 0x00007fa0eec7e135 in core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable-shim}} () from /home/me/.local/share/rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-32779e2abdce211d.so #9 0x00007fa0ee2792aa in as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/c7087fe00d2ba919df1d813c040a5d47e43b0fe7/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:1008 #10 as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/c7087fe00d2ba919df1d813c040a5d47e43b0fe7/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:1008 #11 std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start () at src/libstd/sys/unix/thread.rs:87 #12 0x00007fa0ee193422 in start_thread () from /usr/lib/libpthread.so.0 #13 0x00007fa0ee0b1bf3 in clone () from /usr/lib/libc.so.6 ```
